data.title: Ruth Scherbarth Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Ruth Ann Scherbarth, 71, passed away peacefully in her sleep June 11, 2018. Ruth was born April 27, 1947 to Lorraine and Merle Strong in Milwaukee, WI. Ruth grew up in Milwaukee...
data.text:
Ruth Ann Scherbarth, 71, passed away peacefully in her sleep June 11, 2018. Ruth was born April 27, 1947 to Lorraine and Merle Strong in Milwaukee, WI. Ruth grew up in Milwaukee and graduated from Custer High School in 1965. After high school she married Richard Scherbarth Sr on November 27, 1965.

Ruth enjoyed gardening, spending time with her family and friends, dancing and playing cards. Ruth is preceded in death by her parents, Lorraine and Merle.

Ruth is survived by her husband, Richard Scherbarth Sr.; sons Randy Scherbarth and wife Kim and Richard Jr. and partner Budd; granddaughter Alex Bowey and husband Justin; great grandchildren Riley and Sawyer; sister Mary Schwittau; and many nieces and nephew.

Private services will be held at a later date.
